title: Friend Groups Bugged
body:
so, i currently have 4 different friend groups. i can change the order of the 3 smaller ones perfectly fine, but for some reason the 4th (and largest) will not budge from the top position - no matter what i do with the others it won't be replaced as the highest ordered group. (it isn't the general, just one i made a long while ago)

not game-breaking or anything, but i want to have other groups above it (ie people i duo with, IRL friends) so it'd be great if it could be fixed. :)

replies.body: A possible quick-fix would be to disband that group and then recreate it. It would only be infeasible if you have a lot of friends that aren't in any groups to begin with. If that's the case, you can make *another* group to temporarily store them in as you sort out the initial group. Since friend-groups are linked to accounts, it is very unlikely that it's going to be fixed, so taking action now is probably your best option.
